# sendMyCurrentLocation

**Type Property**

A button title with the text *Send My Current Location*.

## Declaration

```swift
static let sendMyCurrentLocation: LocationButton.Title
```

## Customizing title styles

- **currentLocation**: A button title with the text *Current Location*.
- **sendCurrentLocation**: A button title with the text *Send Current Location*.
- **shareCurrentLocation**: A button title with the text *Share Current Location*.
- **shareMyCurrentLocation**: A button title with the text *Share My Current Location*.
